DOC.brief_summary: The purpose examine additional effect either yoga resistance exercise weight loss weight combine standard behavioral weight loss intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Alternative Exercise Treatments Weight Loss Overweight Women .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female 2 . 2555 year age 3 . BMI = 2535 kg/m2 4 . Ability provide inform consent . 5 . Ability provide consent personal physician participate study . 1 . Participation regular exercise ( aerobic , yoga resistance exercise ) > 20 minute per day > 2 day per week last 3 month . ( This study design recruit relatively sedentary adult . ) 2 . Currently treat psychological disorders/conditions and/or currently take psychotropic medication . 3 . Diabetes , hypothyroidism , medical condition would affect energy metabolism . 4 . Women currently pregnant , pregnant within previous six month , plan become pregnant within next 12 month . ( Pregnancy initial screening base selfreport include detailed medical history complete subject . However , pregnancy status also verify pregnancy test require baseline , 6 12 month DEXA ) . 5 . Nonmedicated rest systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg nonmedicated rest diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg , take medication would affect blood pressure . 6 . Taking medication would affect rest heart rate heart rate response exercise ( e.g. , beta blockade ) . 7 . Arrhythmia rest exercise electrocardiogram would indicate vigorous exercise contraindicate . 8 . History myocardial infarction valvular disease . 9 . History orthopedic complication would prevent optimal participation exercise component ( e.g. , heel spur , severe arthritis ) .
